Unique particle identifier: Vector of relative stripe positions as a function of time. Decimal indicates anterior/posterior positioning. E.g. 2.67 indicates anterior flank of stripe 3. 3.3333 indicates posterior flank of 3
Time in seconds. Interpolated to 20s res.
Probability promoter is in  active state
Probability promoter is in inactive state
On rate. Value for each row reflects average taken across all bootstrap inference results for the relevant region in time and space
Off rate. Value for each row reflects average taken across all bootstrap inference results for the relevant region in time and space
Basal initiation rate. Value for each row reflects average taken across all bootstrap inference results for the relevant region in time and space
Active initiation rate. Value for each row reflects average taken across all bootstrap inference results for the relevant region in time and space
